title: SAMSUNG 255 L Direct Cool Single Door 3 Star Refrigerator with Base Drawer  (Pebble Blue, RR26T389YUT/HL)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Unit Refrigerator, User Manual with Warranty Card
product_specification.Installation & Demo: This product does not require installation. The features of the product are presented in the user manual that comes with it. Hence, the manufacturer does not provide on-site installation or demo for the product. In case of any queries about the installation or the features of product, kindly call us at 1800 208 9898 or (080) 49400000 for assistance.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Product and 10 Years on Compressor From Samsung
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Plastic / Glassware / Bulb / Tube. Any Accessories External to the Product. The Product is Not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Where the Premises is Kept) Conditions That do Not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightening, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centres or Purchasers Residence

product_description.Energy-efficient: Save on electricity bills with this energy-efficient refrigerator by Samsung.
product_description.Digital Inverter Compressor: This feature minimizes noise and consumes less energy as it cools the different levels of this refrigerator by adjusting the compressor speed accordingly.

review: very nice and good product I like it Samsung fridge thank you for Flipkart

Don't trust any negative comments and go for it ..buy it in full trust..I search nearly one month for a good fridge and finally i bought samsung 255l in good price too..i surprised my wife by presenting this fridge..she is very happy.. i dont found any scratches and dent on it..delivery also good..they opened and showed me the fridge.. then they collected the cash from me..nice service from delivery and Flipkart.. and i really thanks Flipkart for this offer..and i thank seller for safe and good product ...cooling was good and no noise..beautiful colour.. i suggest that,who r all going to buy this fridge..just go for it..thank u..

After using it for a week.

Pros:
- it is big, really big.
- spacious and good amount of racks to handle all the items.
- 3 stars and energy consumption is 172 Units per year.
- botton tray can come out that is a very good feature for cleaning the tray.
- nice color.


Cons:
- it needs to be defrost once or twice in a week if running on max power, which I didn't like, I agree this happens in defrost refrigerator, but I have a whirlpool refrigerator also and that I defrost once in a month.


...
READ MORE

High Tech Royal cool Pebble Blue Color, satisfied to the core. We couldn't find either the fridge is running or not, zero noice technology. Invertor fridge max watts 60., per year current consumption nearly 170 units only. Inbuilt stabilizer is ultimate technology, high voltage automatic cutoff, apart from 255 litres, nearly 4 kgs of potato and onion box under the Stand without cooling. Digital stabilizer.
High Tech price purchased during Samsung carnival via flipkart.
Ultimate deliver,
Ulti...
READ MORE
Thank you flipkart... Recieved it on good condition... Really awesome model... Go for it.. assure u..

First Impression:

I upgraded from 192L Samsung Single door to this one. On the looks, the colour is bluish gray and provides slight variation in the shades based on the view angle. I liked I though.

Compared to my old fridge the quality of the glass trays are bit lower. I doubt if they are tuffened glass as there are no marking as such and the trays feel light. Though samsung have mentioned it as a stabilizer free, I prefer to use a stabilizer for an extra layer of protection. The power cord length just reaches the top and couldn't place a stabilizer. Have to plan for placing the same next to it.

Compressor started after a minute on first power ON and it's pretty silent. The cooling is sufficient.

Overall satisfied with the purchase.

Excellent job by flipkart and retailer....i bought this fridge earlier ang got dented, but they replaced,refunded, and with new order again they delivered me same fridge with super condition...customer can trust on this...and must buy those who want to buy...

The defrosted water gets stored in a tray in the back which we need to remove manually twice or thrice a week.
That itself is a deal breaker for a lot of people.
It becomes a good breeding ground for mosquitoes.
I recommend getting a refrigerator with advanced features

Never thought Flipkart could deliver a 6 feet plus box, totally unscratched to the third floor with narrow stairs, well done Flipkart and the seller.
It is a direct cool fridge, so the water and ice will get collected in 2-3 days, so it is advisable to defrost every week. Compared to LG it is little cheaper in price.
Got the pebble blue color, has been few days, Ice takes few hours for form in max setting so no complains so far.

Seller please send 2 keys for the fridge, I got only one.
Spacious and grand..much suitable for a large family...fulfill all the requirements in a very genuine rate...overall love the product
very nice and good product I like it Samsung fridge thank you for Flipkart

The refrigerator is good. The color is much darker than what is shown in the image. It's not purple in color, in fact it looks some other dark color.

The capacity is good. Cooling is good. But if you're looking for a frost free refrigerator then it's not for you. You have to manually defrost it twice a week which is annoying becuase the water container which is placed at the back of the refrigerator above the compressor is non removable. It is difficult for anyone to take the water out from it.

If you don't defrost it manually then it will become some kind of glacier. Freezer becomes ice. Except this one thing, everything is good in this fridge. If that one issue I am facing is not a deal breaker then go for it. Better to go for a frost free refrigerator by paying few more bucks .
Super product highly recommend power cable very short
superb Samsung refrigerator great cooling , thankx Flipkart . I'm so happy this product

Being single door, it is more Spacious, energy efficient and beautiful. The Only issue with single door Fridge is, it is not frost free. We have do it manually every week. Rest is OK.

Adv:
The delivery and installation was good.
The power consumption is less compared to gorej 5 star single door fridge.

DisAdv:
The cooling effect of this fridge is bad, since it's a very large fridge when it keeps the cooling to very low or very high the vegetables and fruits at the bottom rack get damaged. Cooling is not evenly distributed.
If it's kept very high every two days we need to defrost the freezer orelse freezer will be damaged.
In medium mode freezers cooling is not satisfactory but foods are not getting spoiled.
Also it's not recommended to open the fridges many times because it's very large and single door fridge, power will b more and water drops are formed inside.
Product is as described. Quite spacious
Nice one for big families who wants single door fridge. Good height and good functioning. Must buy.
